name: Orange DAO Token Release Request
description:
Only use this form for tokens from approved Proposals and existing budgets. (Not for new spending!)

If there are multiple payments (EG: Multiple OIPs) please note that clearly in the requested tokens field or create a new TRR per OIP so we can verify the request.

All data in this form will be visible to the DAO.

fields.name: Requester Name
fields.description: Nickname is fine as long as we can properly identify you.

fields.name: Requester Email
fields.description: This is where we will send updates regarding this TR.

fields.name: Requester Discord ID
fields.description: For the very important request verification step.

fields.name: Requested Tokens
fields.description: List the token type and number of tokens please.

fields.name: Destination Wallet Address
fields.description: If not listed in proposal or requesting a change. Requires manual verification.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: Which committee is overseeing your proposal? This routes the request to the right people in the DAO. DAO Org Chart: https://orgchart.timeisltd.com/s/sc8GGCVMFW8ilNsfoDAG

fields.name: Notes
fields.description: Anything else you want to add?
